data.name: Trapped Within
data.detailed_description:
Follow the journey of 217 as he navigates through underground caves on his home world in search of the entrance to the lower portion of the pyramid, in hopes of locating the portal that will take him to Earth for their final invasion.

This is a single player rpg puzzler with horror elements where you control the alien 217 as you navigate your way through a pyramid full of traps and puzzles. Your goal is to get him through the underground caves and through the pyramid of traps that were left by his kind to keep Humans from finding a way back to their home world and safely join the invasion of Earth, can you survive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: AMD A6-6310 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated video (AMD RADEON R4 or later), 1GB VRAM. (Shader Model 3)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 Compatible
